description: octagonal blue and white tea caddy; four sections with abstract design on side, two with floral design, one with fenced-in figure holding umbrella with trees and mountains in background, one with seated figure holding umbrella with flowers and leaves and mountains in background; floral designs on top
markings: on bottom, on label: [35D]; on back: collector\'s label; on bottom, on Mark and Marjorie Allen label: [superb Bristol delft tea caddy c. 1760 (See Ray fig. 52)]
title: Tea caddy
